meaningMnemonic: When someone <kanji>quit</kanji>s living you need to offer your <kanji>condolence</kanji>s during their <vocabulary>memorial address</vocabulary>. Let it all out and tell everyone what you thought about that dead guy.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
